title: Structure
description: Structure properties.  Structures may opt-in to "automatic recognition" for when they are constructed by a robot. There are certain limitations on the shape and placement of such "recognizable" structures.

map.description: Cell-based representation of the structure using palette entries

mask.description: A special palette character that indicates that map cell should be transparent

placements.description: Structure placements. Earlier members may occlude later members of the list.
